message.content:
cs.NI, cs.MA, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.OS

This paper deals with the practical solutions for supporting the communications between multiple WiFi Direct groups using Android OS devices. It involves the interconnection of different groups to create multi-hop ad hoc networks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves the analysis of different solutions, which can be categorized under cs.MA (Multiagent Systems) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper proposes techniques to exploit the device ability to maintain simultaneous physical connections to multiple groups, which can be categorized under cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.OS (Operating Systems).
